title: League Crashes IN GAME just after Champ select
body: After Champ Select league gives me bug splat and I am unable to reconnect, I have updated lol, drivers, windows 10, and it feels ran through everything on the Riot how too fix but unable to run still. its a very sad day indeed...

replies.body:
A recent Windows 10 update has caused some players to end up using a Windows display resolution that is not compatible with their display(s). I strongly recommend trying a lower resolution than you're currently using by following [this guide.](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/4910-screen-resolution-display-change-windows-10-a.html)

Let me know if that changed anything.
